name: gross-domestic-product-of-the-united-states
title: Gross Domestic Product Of The United States
description: The Gross Domestic Product Of The United States is the main measure of US economic growth based on the value of goods and services produced from 1930 and 2013.
documentation:
Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of the United States (US) both nominal and real on an annual and quarterly basis. 

Annual data is provided since 1930 and quarterly data since 1947. Both total GDP (levels) and annualized percentage change in GDP are provided. Both levels and changes are available both in current dollars (nominal GDP) and in chained 2009 dollars (real GDP). Data is sourced from US Government's Bureau of Economic Analysis (BEA) and provided in standardized CSV.

fields.name: Date
fields.description: US Gross Domestic Product data year

fields.name: GDP_Level_Current
fields.description: GDP in billions of current dollars

fields.name: GDP_Level_Chained2009_Dollars
fields.description: GDP in billions of chained 2009 dollars

fields.name: GDP_Percent_Change_Current
fields.description: GDP percent change based on current dollars

fields.name: GDP_Percent_Chained2009_Dollars
fields.description: GDP percent change based on chained 2009 dollars
